actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Trible and his staff, and to authorize the testimony of such staff in the case of Commonwealth of Virginia v. Scott Bonner Bento, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Paul S. Trible, Jr., Carol Ann Johnson, and any other staff assistant who may be called to testify in the case of Commonwealth of Virginia v. Scott Bonner Benton, et al. or subsequent related proceedings. Authorizes Ms. Johnson and any other staff assistant to testify in such case, except concerning matters which may be privileged.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Trible and his staff, and to authorize the testimony of such staff in the case of Commonwealth of Virginia v. Scott Bonner Bento, et al.
